metadata.description: Evaluation suite for Android Debug MCP server. Tests ability to manage devices, apps, files, and perform system operations across multiple connected Android devices. Focuses on multi-step workflows requiring 2-5+ tool calls.

qa_pair.question: List all connected Android devices and identify which device has the highest battery level. Return the device ID and battery percentage.
qa_pair.answer: Will vary by setup - requires list_devices() then check_device_health() for each device to compare battery levels

qa_pair.question: For device ABC123, find all user-installed apps (not system apps) and determine which app takes up the most storage space. Return the package name and size.
qa_pair.answer: Requires list_packages(filter="user") then get_app_info() for each to find largest

qa_pair.question: Check if device ABC123 has USB debugging enabled and is properly authorized. Also check if wireless ADB is currently active. Return the authorization status and wireless status.
qa_pair.answer: Requires list_devices() to check mode, get_device_info() to check wireless ADB status

qa_pair.question: For device ABC123, backup the APK file for package com.android.chrome to local path /backups/, then verify the backup was successful by checking if the file exists locally.
qa_pair.answer: Requires backup_app() then local filesystem verification

qa_pair.question: Among all connected devices, identify which device is currently in fastboot/bootloader mode. If none are in bootloader mode, identify which device is in regular device mode and could be rebooted to bootloader.
qa_pair.answer: Requires list_devices() and checking mode field for each device

qa_pair.question: For device ABC123, get the last 100 lines of system logs filtered for errors only (priority E). Count how many error messages mention "ActivityManager". Return the count.
qa_pair.answer: Requires get_device_logs(filter="*:E") then parsing output to count ActivityManager mentions

qa_pair.question: Check if device ABC123 has root access available. If it does, also check if the bootloader is unlocked. Return both status values.
qa_pair.answer: Requires get_device_info() which includes isRooted and bootloaderUnlocked fields

qa_pair.question: List all files in /sdcard/Download/ directory on device ABC123 and identify the largest file. Return the filename and size in bytes.
qa_pair.answer: Requires list_files(path="/sdcard/Download/") then comparing size field to find largest

qa_pair.question: For device ABC123, check if the package com.example.testapp is currently enabled or disabled. If it's disabled, what would be the exact command/action needed to enable it?
qa_pair.answer: Requires get_app_info() or list_packages() to check status, then manage_app_state(action="enable") to enable

qa_pair.question: Device ABC123 is currently in normal device mode. To flash a custom boot partition, what are the exact steps needed? List the required tools in order and any safety tokens needed.
